prerequisites: Permission of the instructor by online application at bystander initiative.ca
courseName: Practical Strategies for Social Change: Intervening to Prevent Sexual Assault
notes: Restricted to students who have attained a cumulative GPA of 66% or higher at the time of application. Also offered as KINE-3501, PSYC-3500, SACR-3500, SJST-3500, SWRK-3500, and WGST-3500.
